articles.author: Mark Ogden
articles.title: Champions League finalists Chelsea, Man City have ruled English football for a decade. Here's why that will continue - ESPN India
articles.description: Chelsea and Manchester City have reached the summit of European football, but there's so much more to their decade of success than lavish spending.
articles.content: The Champions League final proves, in a sense, that money buys success. Chelsea vs. Manchester City is the team bankrolled by a Russian oligarch against the club that has been transformed by the fina… [+11126 chars]
